resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.description:
*Solving the problem/R bindings* section of the Steps in making your first PR.

Steps in making your first PR outline:
 * Set up (command line and Git)
 * Building Arrow package
 ** Building C++
 ** Building PyArrow
 ** Building R-Arrow
 * Finding good first issues
 * Solving the problem
 ** Python bindings
 ** R bindings
 * Testing
 * Life cycle of a Pull Request
 ** Making the PR
 ** Reviews and get the PR merge
fields.summary: [Doc] Steps in making your first PR - R bindings

comments.body: I will insert the reference to the content of [https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11915] once the PR is closed. With it this issue can be closed also.
